home.title: Welcome to CodinLab
home.content: Master diverse coding languages, bring your ideas to life, and experience a fun and interactive learning journey that surpasses traditional methods.
home.roads.title: Roads
home.roads.content: Lay the basics of programming (software) languages firmly and move step by step through the coding universe with Roads!
home.labs.title: Labs
home.labs.content: Improve your algorithm and programming skills, get practical experience and put your coding knowledge into practice with Labs!

admin.activity.content: Activities are measured by the completion of roads and labs.
